definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><value name="_placeholder"><block deletable="false" movable="false" type="entity_iterator"/></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_entities"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value><value name="b"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_play_break_effect"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.STONE#0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"/></value></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
